description: This course will examine the role of international law in the growth and economic evolution of developing states. Issues of international investment, international trade and trade finance, the environment, and human rights will be considered.
restricted:
MAppLaw, LLM, LLM(Adv), LLM(16), LLM(24), MICLaw(16), MIL and MIR/MIL. 
Quota: Minimum of 12 enrolments.
